summary: Feature request to implement two new routes for handling local activities in the PHP SDK: ExecuteLocalActivity and RequestCancelLocalActivity, with corresponding handlers on the RoadRunner side.
userImpact: Users cannot execute or cancel local activities in the PHP SDK, limiting functionality available in other SDKs.
proposedFix: Add ExecuteLocalActivity and RequestCancelLocalActivity routes with RoadRunner-side handlers.
resolutionDetails: Routes were implemented to support local activity execution and cancellation.
keyQuote: We need to support two new routes: `ExecuteLocalActivity` and `RequestCancelLocalActivity`.
